abstract: Bank of America has won support for its takeover of Merrill Lynch from Glass Lewis & Company, a firm that advises institutional stockholders on how to vote their shares, Bloomberg News reports.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America has won support for its takeover of Merrill Lynch from Glass Lewis & Company, a firm that advises institutional stockholders on how to vote their shares, Bloomberg News reports.

headline.main: Bank of America Wins Support for Merrill Deal
